DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study measure difference proportion postpartum woman use contraception Community Health Worker ( CHW ) family plan educational intervention compare woman receive standard care West Bank district Ramallah Al-Bireh . DOC.brief_title: Investigating Effect Prenatal Family Planning Counseling Intervention Led Community Health Workers Postpartum Contraceptive Use Among Women West Bank
